name: Mr. Wings Demo
description:
I am Mr. Wings

Also known as

Mr. Wilson
 ­

(localized in Português do Brasil and English)

­ 

Mr.Wings Demo is a prototype made for a gamedesign college final paper.

It builds the core mechanics of movement, combat and dialogues while using 8x8 pixel art and progressive music.

The complete game will continue the story and show what happened after "that".

­ 

To help feedbacking the game, you can share your opinion on a pre made form
PT-BR: feedback do MPV de Mr.Wings
ENG: Mr.Wings MPV feedback

All sounds used on THIS link
